chatbot.evidence: The customer mentioned interacting with a chatbot
chatbot.description: The customer complained about the chatbot not being able to assist and the call getting hung up
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's ability to assist customers and ensure that calls do not get hung up

complaint.description: The customer's data allocation was consistently depleted on the same dates and when they contacted Telkom, they were unable to get assistance
complaint.suggestion: Investigate and resolve the issue with the data allocation and improve customer support to address complaints effectively

meta.review_content:
I have a contract with Telkom which states that i will have 40gb of data for day and 40 gb data for night,
For the past 3 months my data depleted on the same dates which was mostly the 18th
I logged in and check on my Telkom app this morning after data was allocated
I noticed that my data was allocated but it was shot with 20gb,
I called all the Telkom customer care lines only to chat with a chatbot and the call get hanged up.
